title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the multilingual educational assistant, including target languages, subject areas, desired features, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for natural language processing, knowledge base, content generation, user interface, and integrations with external educational resources and APIs.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Implement the NLP module to handle language understanding, intent recognition, and language generation in multiple languages.

title: Build Knowledge Base and Content Generation
description: Develop the knowledge base and content generation components to store and retrieve educational content, and generate personalized tutorials and exercises.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the educational assistant, including support for multiple languages and accessibility features.

title: Integrate Components and Test
description: Integrate the NLP module, knowledge base, content generation, and user interface components, and perform comprehensive testing.
dependencies: Build Knowledge Base and Content Generation

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as user authentication, data encryption, and input validation.

title: Set up Deployment and Monitoring
description: Configure the deployment environment, set up monitoring and logging systems, and establish processes for updates and maintenance.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
